description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 22/01359/FUL (Demolition of existing Hawks Road Clinic to provide two buildings comprising flexible Use Class E and F2 floorspace and 125 Use Class C3 residential apartments, landscaping, parking facilities, cycle parking facilities, servicing, access and associated public realm improvements.). Amendment to tree works.
decision_conditions: Condition 40 which currently reads: The works shall be delivered in accordance with the Arboricultural Method Statement dated April 2022 and the 1664-KC-XX-YTREE-TPP01 Rev A Tree Protection Plan. The approved Tree protection scheme shall be implemented prior to commencement of any work on site including demolition, and be maintained to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority until the completion of the development or until such stage as detailed within the approved AMS.Reason: To safeguard trees worthy of retention and in the interests of the character and appearance of the area, in accordance with policy G7 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.This condition must be a pre-commencement condition in order to be effective.is reaplced with: The works shall be delivered in accordance with the Arboricultural Method Statement dated January 2023 and 1664-KC-XX-YTREE-TPP01 Rev B Tree Protection Plan. The approved Tree protection scheme shall be implemented prior to commencement of any work on site including demolition, and be maintained to the reasonable satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority until the completion of the development or until such stage as detailed within the approved AMS.Reason: To safeguard trees worthy of retention and in the interests of the character and appearance of the area, in accordance with policy G7 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.This condition must be a pre-commencement condition in order to be effective.
